title: Abura
description:
A night of fierce battles that rocked the end of the Edo period!

Kyoto, the end of the Tokugawa Shogunate in turmoil.

To recover the bodies of their slain comrades,
Only seven Goryoueiji, the seven guards of the Shinsengumi, are fighting to recover the bodies of their comrades who were killed.
To recover the bodies of their slain comrades, a mere seven Goryoeiji stand up against the Shinsengumi. ......

The last civil war of the Shinsengumi,
The greatest battle in the history of Japanese swordsmanship
The "Abura-no-Koji Incident" begins!
author: Number 8
